mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND deleted is NULL;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted is NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (company_id, position_id, department_id, employment_status_id, prefecture_id, name, birthday, sex, blood, phone_number, postal_code, address, mail_address, join_date, retirement_date, created, modified) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{positionId}, #{departmentId}, #{employmentStatusId}, #{prefectureId}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{blood}, #{phoneNumber}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{mailAddress}, #{joinDate}, #{retirementDate}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.delete: UPDATE employees SET deleted = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
